title: Do You Recognize The 5 Early Warning Signs Of Apostasy? | Unapologetic Episode 43
itunes:title: Do You Recognize The 5 Early Warning Signs Of Apostasy? | Unapologetic Episode 43
description: How would you know if you or someone you love is at risk of leaving the Christian faith? We look at five warning signs on this episode of Unapologetic with Dr. Bobby Conway, the One Minute Apologist; and your host, Tim Hull. Take the OMA Mental Health Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/mhcc Take the OMA Apologetics Crash Course https://oneminuteapologist.com/acc https://www.patreon.com/oneminuteapologist Do you ever doubt your ability to answer bigger than life questions like, “Why do I exist? What is the purpose of life? Can I know God? If so, how? Are miracles possible?” And if God exists what’s with all the evil in the world? Do questions like these ever nag at you? If so, you’ve come to the right channel. I too am a fellow wonderer who thinks about stuff like this. I (Bobby Conway) am the founder and host of the rapidly-growing ministry, The One Minute Apologist, which is found on YouTube and at oneminuteapologist.com. Here I provide quick, credible answers to apologetic questions that resource people with a hunger to defend their Christian faith. These videos will often include interviews. I’ve had the privilege of interviewing some of the world's leading Christian apologists. Among them are: William Lane Craig, Josh McDowell, Hank Hanegraaff, JP Moreland, Norman Geisler, Frank Turek, and many more.
